ygData.subject: Re: Binding in CB
ygData.msgSnippet: Yup. But I did all of my adventuring until my early 20s on Faydwer (the continent with Faydark on it), so I never got bound anywhere until I went to Kunark at
ygData.messageBody:
Yup. But I did all of my adventuring until my
early 20s on Faydwer (the continent with Faydark on
it), so I never got bound anywhere until I went to
Kunark at something like level 21. Nothing on Faydark is
so far away that you have to get bound, IMO.
<br><br>Oh, and someone asked about the legal ramifications
of running a dating club . . . The possible
ramifications are that if someone gets assaulted, killed, etc.,
then in some cases the person running the club might
get blamed (read: sued) for not running background
checks on everyone who joins and letting in psychos.
<br><br>Kharlisht
